sourcesContent:
import { Formik, Form, Field, ErrorMessage } from 'formik'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; const RegisterForm = ({ onSubmit }) => { const validationSchema = Yup.object({ username: Yup.string() .min(3, 'Username must be at least 3 characters') .required('Username is required'), email: Yup.string() .email('Invalid email address') .required('Email is required'), password: Yup.string() .min(6, 'Password must be at least 6 characters') .required('Password is required'), confirmPassword: Yup.string() .oneOf([Yup.ref('password'), null], 'Passwords must match') .required('Please confirm your password'), role: Yup.string() .oneOf(['attendee', 'organizer', 'vendor'], 'Invalid role') .required('Role is required'), }); return ( {({ isSubmitting }) => (
)} ); }; export default RegisterForm;
